page.title: 11THE DISTRICT SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: The Asda superstore employs approximately 500 staff.The store covers 7,200m. square. The car park holds 650 cars.Most people who shop there are within 15mins. driving time away from the store. Around 25,000 customers shop there every week. We interviewed people who had been shopping at Asda and we found that most of them preferred Asda to other shops because of the convenience. They could park their cars there and everything is under one roof and prices are generally cheaper.Other shops at the centre include a newsagents, shoe shop, hair dressers, chemist, ice-cream bar, Roomsets Kitchen, Building Society, Post Office and the Midland Bank.
